results.title: Ask an Australian about driving [Turkish version]
results.creator_credit: Kay Roberts and Artransa Park Studios
results.brief_description: Shows various driving conditions that may be encountered in Australia. The demands of both city and country driving are dealt with. Different traffic regulations in each state are explained, with emphasis on the need to obey traffic signs and laws. Shows how to set about buying a car. Note: In Turkish.
results.description: Shows various driving conditions that may be encountered in Australia. The demands of both city and country driving are dealt with. Different traffic regulations in each state are explained, with emphasis on the need to obey traffic signs and laws. Shows how to set about buying a car. Note: In Turkish.
description_for_label: Shows various driving conditions that may be encountered in Australia. The demands of both city and country driving are dealt with. Different traffic regulations in each state are explained, with emphasis on the need to obey traffic signs and laws. Shows how to set about buying a car. Note: In Turkish.

results.title: Ask an Australian about driving [Greek version]
results.creator_credit: Kay Roberts and Artransa Park Studios
results.brief_description: Shows the various types of driving conditions that may be encountered in Australia. The demands of both city and country driving are dealt with, and the different traffic regulations in each state are explained. The need to heed traffic signs and laws is emphasised. Also shows how to set about purchasing a car. Note: In Greek
results.description: Shows the various types of driving conditions that may be encountered in Australia. The demands of both city and country driving are dealt with, and the different traffic regulations in each state are explained. The need to heed traffic signs and laws is emphasised. Also shows how to set about purchasing a car. Note: In Greek

results.title: Ask an Australian about still water swimming [Turkish version]
results.creator_credit: Peter Lake and Artransa Park Studios
results.brief_description: At a family picnic by a river, a father explains to his young son the dangers of swimming in still water. The film then shows the rescue methods relevant to swimming pools, rivers and calm beaches. Note: In Turkish.
results.title_for_label: Ask an Australian about still water swimming [Turkish version]

results.title: Asian students in Australia
results.creator_credit: Mervyn Scales, John Martin-Jones and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
results.brief_description: This film shows Asian students being welcomed into Australian university life, and learning about the Australian way of life in general.
